issue.title: Build failures with gcc on Apple M1
issue.body:
Building liboqs with gcc-11 on an Apple M1 Mac yields build failures related to Kyber and Saber NTT code.

Reproduce by checking out 0.7.1, and then running `cmake -GNinja -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc-11 ..`.  (Note that there are other build failures on HEAD when building with gcc-11 on macOS which are independent of this which I'll create a separate issue for.)

```
[667/1230] Building ASM object src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_base_mul.S.o
FAILED: src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_base_mul.S.o 
/opt/homebrew/bin/gcc-11  -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/build/include -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64 -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/common/pqclean_shims -arch arm64 -fPIC -mcpu=native -Werror -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Wstrict-prototypes -Wshadow -Wformat=2 -Wfloat-equal -Wwrite-strings -O3 -fomit-frame-pointer -fdata-sections -ffunction-sections -Wl,-dead_strip -MD -MT src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_base_mul.S.o -MF src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_base_mul.S.o.d -o src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_base_mul.S.o -c /Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_base_mul.S
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_base_mul.S:10:3: error: unknown directive
  .type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_point_mul_extended, %function
  ^
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_base_mul.S:77:1: error: unknown directive
.type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_asymmetric_mul, %function
^
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_base_mul.S:232:1: error: unknown directive
.type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_asymmetric_mul_montgomery, %function
^
[668/1230] Building ASM object src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_iNTT.S.o
FAILED: src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_iNTT.S.o 
/opt/homebrew/bin/gcc-11  -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/build/include -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64 -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/common/pqclean_shims -arch arm64 -fPIC -mcpu=native -Werror -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Wstrict-prototypes -Wshadow -Wformat=2 -Wfloat-equal -Wwrite-strings -O3 -fomit-frame-pointer -fdata-sections -ffunction-sections -Wl,-dead_strip -MD -MT src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_iNTT.S.o -MF src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_iNTT.S.o.d -o src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_iNTT.S.o -c /Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_iNTT.S
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_iNTT.S:8:1: error: unknown directive
.type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_intt_SIMD_bot, %function
^
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_iNTT.S:94:1: error: unknown directive
.type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_intt_SIMD_top, %function
^
[669/1230] Building ASM object src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_NTT.S.o
FAILED: src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_NTT.S.o 
/opt/homebrew/bin/gcc-11  -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/build/include -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64 -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/common/pqclean_shims -arch arm64 -fPIC -mcpu=native -Werror -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Wstrict-prototypes -Wshadow -Wformat=2 -Wfloat-equal -Wwrite-strings -O3 -fomit-frame-pointer -fdata-sections -ffunction-sections -Wl,-dead_strip -MD -MT src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_NTT.S.o -MF src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_NTT.S.o.d -o src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_NTT.S.o -c /Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_NTT.S
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_NTT.S:8:1: error: unknown directive
.type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_ntt_SIMD_top, %function
^
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_NTT.S:177:1: error: unknown directive
.type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_ntt_SIMD_bot, %function
^
[671/1230] Building ASM object src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_poly.S.o
FAILED: src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_poly.S.o 
/opt/homebrew/bin/gcc-11  -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/build/include -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64 -I/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/common/pqclean_shims -arch arm64 -fPIC -mcpu=native -Werror -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Wstrict-prototypes -Wshadow -Wformat=2 -Wfloat-equal -Wwrite-strings -O3 -fomit-frame-pointer -fdata-sections -ffunction-sections -Wl,-dead_strip -MD -MT src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_poly.S.o -MF src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_poly.S.o.d -o src/kem/kyber/CMakeFiles/kyber_1024_aarch64.dir/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_poly.S.o -c /Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_poly.S
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_poly.S:8:1: error: unknown directive
.type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_add_reduce, %function
^
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_poly.S:72:1: error: unknown directive
.type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_sub_reduce, %function
^
/Users/dstebila/Dev/OQS/liboqs/src/kem/kyber/pqclean_kyber1024_aarch64/__asm_poly.S:136:1: error: unknown directive
.type PQCLEAN_KYBER1024_AARCH64_asm_add_add_reduce, %function
^
[676/1230] Building C object src/kem/classic_mceliece/CMakeFiles/classic_mceliece_6960119f_vec.dir/pqclean_mceliece6960119f_vec/controlbits.c.o
ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.
```

comment.body:
> > Oh okay I will try that. After I build it I can run the binary natively? Like I can just import the dylib file into my project that uses liboqs-python and that will work?
> 
> I don't see any reason why shouldn't be able to use the binary.

Yeah it works! Thanks!

issue.title: Remove BIKE L1 and OQS default algorithms

comment.body: I've changed to what the "doone" parameter uses in the v8 branch, since that's what its CI script calls. Tests are now passing, now that there are not nearly as many cases.
